description:
Description:-
For now, there is 10-11 language support, but more can be added.
Look at the files https://github.com/openMF/community-app/tree/develop/app/angular/i18n

Steps to Reproduce:-
Open your browser and move to http://openmf.github.io/community-app/ and check language supports

Expected Behaviour:-
There will be more language support for this community app.

Actual Behaviour:-
For now, there are 11 language support

Settings:-
Mifos X version: 17.07.01.RELEASE
Browser used: Chrome
OS: Ubuntu
name: Add more language support using i18 internationalization
